# Bolajon.uz - AI Information

## About
Bolajon.uz is an educational platform designed to teach English to children aged 5-9 years old in Uzbekistan. The platform uses interactive games, video lessons, and a reward system to make learning fun and engaging.

## Key Features
- Interactive video lessons covering alphabet, numbers, colors, animals, and more
- Educational games: "Pop the Balloon", "Drop to Basket", "Learn Verbs"
- Star reward system - children earn stars for completing lessons
- Gift shop - stars can be exchanged for rewards
- Teacher dashboard for managing students and tracking progress
- Uzbek language interface

## Target Audience
- Children aged 5-9 years old
- Parents looking for English learning resources for their kids
- Teachers and tutors in Uzbekistan
- Educational institutions

## Location
Based in Uzbekistan, serving Uzbek-speaking families

## Website
https://bolajoon.uz

## Contact
For partnerships and inquiries, visit the website.

## Topics
- English language learning
- Children's education
- EdTech
- Interactive learning
- Gamification in education
- Uzbekistan education
